main event: A military crew reported sighting two contrails while approaching Thule, Greenland.
interesting points: The first contrail was sighted approximately 60 miles south of Thule at an altitude of 8000 feet.,The second contrail was observed nearly over Thule at around 4000 feet during descent.,All crew members initially thought they were contrails but were unsure if they could be unusual weather phenomena.,The temperature at 8000 feet was 50Â°F and a slight inversion was reported at the time of sightings.,Upper winds were reported at 20 knots from a northerly direction, which could have influenced the contrail formation.
witness description: crew members aboard a C-54 aircraft
